name: FIND & RUN
description:
Note: Only playable with 2 gamepads.

Deliver the object requested before the other player and place it over the target🎯.

Controlls (GAMEPAD)

  •  Left joystick: move (up, down, right, left)
  • Right Trigger: dash (move faster and can unpin object from enemy)
  • A:  Grab object  (while pressed)

Made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Jam site: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/find-run-0
